name: Good Dog (spiderhoney)
description:
The current build runs on the most recent versions of Firefox and Chrome (on Windows) and Pale Moon (on Linux). I haven't started mobile testing or added support for larger browsers yet.

Changes in 1.01: larger Play/Next button, typo fixes, split a longish passage that pushed the Play/Next button off the bottom of the screen for some users
Changes in 1.02: A couple more typo fixes
Changes in 1.03: Changed a light green div that didn't fade properly to a more saturated green
